banner.title: PRICING
banner.description: Create a your stories, Photosnap is a platform for photographers and visual storytellers. It's the simple way to create and share your photos.

Basic.name: Basic
Basic.description: Includes basic usage of our platform. Recommended for new and aspiring photographers.

Pro.name: Pro
Pro.description: More advanced features available. Recommended for photography veterans and professionals.

Business.name: Business
Business.description: Additional features available such as more detailed metrics. Recommended for business owners.
